name: WordPress w/ Elementor (scraped styles and scripts)
description: Replaces the built-in blog and webpages with WordPress + Elementor. The styles are brought in by scraping the html of the site to find the stylesheets and style tags.

preInstall.instructions:
You should first install the WPGraphQL plugin on your WordPress site: https://www.wpgraphql.com/docs/quick-start#install-from-your-wordpress-dashboard 

Then, add the code within preinstall.md to the functions.php file in your WordPress theme.

postInstall.instructions: Start up your dev server and Elementor pages should now be rendering in the site at their registered slugs.

troubleshooting.issue: All pages return a "not found" error.
troubleshooting.solve: Make sure you have installed and activated the WPGraphQL plugin: https://www.wpgraphql.com/docs/quick-start#install-from-your-wordpress-dashboard
The WPGraphQL plugin needs to be extended to return this field in the response. To do this, add the code within preinstall.md to the functions.php file in your WordPress theme.
